column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=I think very highly of Wikipedia .
#Text=I think that ’s most of the criticisms about it are completely missing the point .
#Text=The reason Wikipedia is useful is not because it has a similar error rate to Britannica for example .
#Text=That ’s one thing you often see in comparison .

#Text=I think that a lot of the criticism of Wikipedia misses a key point -- that the way people interact with Wikipedia is fundamentally different from interaction with any other reference source in history .
#Text=Wikipedia is a system for pooling information .
#Text=It 's where you go to find the consensus of interested parties backed up by citation .
#Text=Yes , someone can edit an article and cause harm , but someone can also shoot you in the face while you 're walking down a street .
#Text=It does n't make walking on streets a broken behavior .
#Text=People use Wikipedia , by and large , properly -- as a glance at the collected pool of information on a subject , to figure out what something is or how it works .
#Text=It 's not a scholarly reference book , and I do n't know anyone who treats it like one .
#Text=Politics and religion
#Text=Now we ’re going to move on to something fairly controversial , because just I ca n’t resist .
#Text=Religion and politics .
#Text=You criticized Young Earth creationism and in the same strip ( Comic 258 , Conspiracy Theories ) make a bug report to God .
#Text=It 's not clear how much the strip represents your own religious views but how much does that one ?
#Text=How much do others ?
#Text=R : It ’s a hard balance .
#Text=I try to avoid being preachy because I can just talk endlessly for anything especially when someone is listening to me because it 's part of their job .
#Text=I could go on and on .
#Text=I ’ve avoided making the comic too personal just to avoid people feeling like they are reading someone else 's stuff .
#Text=They should feel " that could be me . "
#Text=If I were like this is the part that represents me and this is n’t that takes away from some of that .
#Text=But I do n’t think there ’s any contradiction there .
#Text=I think that Young Earth creationism is such a fringe idea that this concept that the Earth is young is not representative of anything that ’s real spirituality .
#Text=That ’s a misunderstanding .
#Text=They are looking at science and then convincing themselves that their ideas are scientific and then really thinking we ’re doing science here and deceiving themselves .
#Text=It seems much more like a delusion than anything to do with the validity of religion .
#Text=And for making a bug report to God- Einstein would talk about God all the time .
#Text=It 's sort of a device .
#Text=Einstein did n’t believe in God not in the way we talk about it today .
#Text=But he ’d talk about understanding what God did when he made the universe in looking at physics .
#Text=That ’s sort of the same way I approach that .
#Text=It ’s a convenient device .
#Text=It ’s a way to make a joke or something .
#Text=At one point I referred to the “ the gods ” as a multiple thing because that works just as well I feel like .
